summary: FUEL GAUGE WOULD READ FULL OR HALF FULL EVEN THOUGH TANK WOULD BE EMPTY.  I SET MY TRIP MILEAGE FOR MORE THAN A YEAR AND WOULD PUT MORE GAS IN ABOUT EVERY 300 MILES.  DEALER CHARGED ME $400 TO REMOVE THE TANK AND REPLACE A SENSOR THAT SITS ON TOP OF THE TANK.  HAD VAPOR LOCK PROBLEMS A FEW DAYS AFTER THAT.  *JB
